entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
